oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hord Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church: service program for Eastertide
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Hord Chapel AME Church
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hord Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church
Union Ridge Rd. near Hord Rd, Wartrace, TN
Service program for the April 6, 1997, at season of Eastertide. The program includes information about includes staff and ministers, and the order of service for the day.
The congregation that utilized Hord Chapel formed c. 1870. The building was constructed c. 1920 and served as a meeting house until at least the 1990s but appeared to be abandoned by 2009.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: African Methodist Episcopal Church
